snippet.title: IXION | Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on PS5: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10009170
Wishlist on Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mvmphf8nkhb

The award winning sci-fi/city builder is coming to PS5 and Xbox Series S/X! 

IXION is an unrelenting, city-building odyssey across the stars. As Administrator of the Tiqqun, DOLOS’ prototype space station, you are tasked with balancing preservation and exploration as you manage infrastructure, resources and crew. Can you keep the flame of humanity alight in the cold dark?

--------------------------------------------------------
Stores
--------------------------------------------------------
On PS5: 
https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/concept/10009170
On Xbox: 
https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9mvmphf8nkhb

--------------------------------------------------------
Social Media
--------------------------------------------------------
KASEDO GAMES
https://www.kasedogames.com/

Follow us on Twitter @KasedoGames: https://twitter.com/KasedoGames

Find us on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/KasedoGames


BULWARK STUDIOS
https://www.bulwarkstudios.com

Follow us on Twitter @bulwarkStudios: https://twitter.com/bulwarkStudios

Find us on Facebook: 
https://www.facebook.com/BulwarkStudios/

--------------------------------------------------------
About Us
--------------------------------------------------------
About Kasedo Games:
Kasedo Games is the 'digital first' division of Kalypso Media. At Kasedo (Kass-ee-doh) Games, our aim is to publish video games that players will love, but not at the expense of the people making them.

We work closely together with enthusiastic indie developers and offer them our vast experience to help get their game in front of a global audience. Titles under the Kasedo label include: 'IXION, 'City of Gangsters', Recipe for Disaster', 'Filament', 'Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus', 'Rise of Industry', 'Project Highrise' and ‘Crowntakers’. www.kasedogames.com
